title: Making Lace: Then and Now, an interview with Elena Kanagy-Loux, pt 2
itunes:title: Making Lace: Then and Now, an interview with Elena Kanagy-Loux, pt 2
description:
Founder of the Brooklyn Lace Guild, Elena Kanagy-Loux joins us to discuss her work and the contemporary scene for makers of handmade lace.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
